org.webcurator.domain.model.core
Class Task

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.domain.model.core.Task

public class Task
extends java.lang.Object

A Task represents an action that must be taken by a user within the WCT system. A Task can be assigned directly to a User of the system, or viewable by all Users with a specified privilege.

Author:
bprice
